name: GlobalUnsubscribeUser
description:
Set a user's global unsubscribe status in Customer.io.

Use this tool to set a person's global unsubscribe status to true in Customer.io, attributed to a specific email delivery. Ideal when managing unsubscribe actions outside the default subscription pathways. It helps in segmenting audiences based on unsubscribe actions. Note: For custom subscription centers, additional requests are needed to manage custom attributes.

parameters.name: delivery_id_for_unsubscription
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the delivery associated with the unsubscription request. This links the unsubscribe action to a specific email or message delivery.

value_schema.description: The delivery resulting in a request to unsubscribe.

parameters.name: set_unsubscribed_attribute
parameters.description: If true, sets a person's `unsubscribed` attribute to true, associated with a specific delivery.

value_schema.description: If true, a person's `unsubscribed` attribute is set to true and the unsubscription is attributed to the delivery.
